fortunes.message: You will step on Lego today. Beware.
A hidden blessing will reveal itself soon.
Kung mahal ka niya, hindi ka niya ipaparamdam na pangalawa.
Magugutom ka mamaya. Pero hindi ka pa rin marunong magluto.
Congratulations! You will win an argument… in your head.
Oops. That sound wasn’t your chair.
May lihim na humahanga sa’yo. Clue: lagi mo siyang nakikita.
The darkest nights bring the brightest stars.
May darating na chismis. Huwag kang papatol.
Sometimes, the cookie crumbles… like your last relationship.
